description: Tenant reports a noisy neighbor, the assistant creates a complaint ticket and confirms the logged ticket to the tenant.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent that can retrieve lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. You also have the ability to log a new maintenance/complaint ticket for a property when a tenant reports an issue.
Hi, I’m hearing loud music late at night from the unit next door. It’s been happening almost every weekend and it’s really disruptive. Can you help me resolve this?
I’m sorry you’re dealing with that. I’ll log a noise‑complaint ticket for you right away so our property‑management team can follow up with the neighbor.

arguments.description: Noise complaint: loud music from neighboring unit during night hours.

messages.content: Your noise complaint has been logged as ticket **TCKT7890** and is currently marked as **open**. Our team will contact the neighboring tenant and work to resolve the issue. You’ll receive an update within the next 24 hours. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with.
